By Divider on Monday, December 23, 2002 - 12:42 am:

Black Box (Can Only Be Gotten From Strays(I Think, thats where i got all of mine..))
ItemDescription
VicCharmVictory charm. Comes thru in the clutch
SeeScrolScroll of secrets on anticipating attacks.
PowStoneStone of strength. Increases a monster ability.
LuckFragMysterious lucky fragment. Keep it bottled!
SpdStoneMakes one fleet. Increases a monster ability.
DefStoneStone of toughness. Increases a monster ability.
EaglMaskCeremonial Eagle Mask with very sharp eyes.
WndStonePower of wind. Increases a monster ability
LifStoneLife-force stone. Increases a monster ability.
IntStoneStone of knowledge. Increases a monster ability.
DefCharmAn amulet that holds the spirit of a tough warrior.


Should I even post the descriptions ?? (even for items you already noe... like EaglMask..)

By Lisa Shock on Monday, December 23, 2002 - 08:40 am:

A quick note about the What's in the Box? thread in general: I just thought it was a nice extra. I know it's a low-level priority, I just thought I would start it in the hopes that eventually we could have a useful chart.
